outcome: The Council moves quickly to restore order, initiating a silent BCI recalibration campaign.

events.description: Harmonists secretly deploy a trusted engineering team to override Halden's credentials and begin recalibrating BCI protocols citywide.

Transport delays grow, but new system prompts urge calm and promise imminent improvements. Social media is flooded with positive testimonials from verified high-BCI users, though some suspect they are fabricated.
A Harmonist informant is caught leaking BCI vulnerability details to Innovator sympathizers. Brief infighting is quietly suppressed before reaching wider circles.
Most visible BCI scoring instabilities subside, but intimate, everyday friction remains; minor mismatches and peculiar delays are quietly accepted as normal.
